name: Public Perception
description:
Congratulations and welcome to the Daily Bagel News Sanitization Sector! You have been selected as our brand new media sanitizer due to the lack of work and moral questioning! Your job is to make sure the public are in a right happy mood and not worry about anything nasty going on around the world; we don't want to cause mass panic! Although, please do keep readers engaged, maybe a little panic is alright...

Gameplay

Play as a worker, who must moderate the articles that come through their office, with two possible endings per day, and three possible endings at the end of the work week. Decide what news articles to push through to the public and which to destroy. 

--Controls--

Left mouse button to click around. 

Right mouse button to drop news article. 

F to zoom in.
